Service Details: Offers reliable, safe 'through the door' accompaniment service. Services include: - liaison between medical staff and family, medical appointments, dental appointments, adult day programs, dialysis appointments - grocery shopping, personal shopping, -  airport service (through to gate departure), vacation accompaniment, social event accompaniment, customized wine and scenic tours
Eligibility: Serves seniors, people with diverse abilities, special needs and those who have had surgery and need safe transportation, therefore, we are open to people of all ages
Cost: Service - Please call for a quote
Accessibility: - Wheelchair and walker friendly- Must be able to self-transfer
